additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-47, Albumen, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Sodium Hydroxide.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

description: Ogx Nourishing + Hydrating Coconut Milk Conditioner For Dry Hair
